thoughts.text: I think I should use the 'google' command to search for information about the Brno Reservoir trail.
thoughts.reasoning: Since I was not able to find information about the Brno Reservoir trail on the website 'https://www.brno.cz/en/', I should use the 'google' command to search for information. By using the 'google' command, I can search for information about the trail on the internet.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'google' command to search for information about the Brno Reservoir trail.
